MedicationReconciliation.name: MedicationReconciliation
MedicationReconciliation.description: Stores information about a medication reconciliation conducted for a patient

ConductedById.description: The user who started the medication reconciliation for the patient.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the medication reconciliation.

PatientId.description: The patient for whom the medication reconciliation is performed.

ProcessEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the medication reconciliation process for the patient was completed.

ProcessStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the medication reconciliation process for the patient was started.

SourceSysModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

Status.description: The status of the medication reconciliation.
